db_init module¶

class db_init.zz8_db(config)¶

Bases: object

This class connects to the mongo database. If the database doesn’t exist, pymongo will create it.

connection()¶

Creates the mongo client

Returns: True

dbinit()¶

Sets up the database and creates it, if it doesn’t already exist

Returns: True

delete_reminder(id)¶

Deletes reminders

Parameters

id (Int) – UUID for a document in mongodb

Returns

return true or false for the operation

Return type

Bool

get_channel_prefs()¶

Return every guild and the channel prefs for those guilds

Returns

Top level element is the guild uuid

second level element is a list of the uuids of each channel :rtype: dict

get_guild_prefs(guild)¶
get_user_interests(user_id)¶

Queries mongo for the specified user

Attributes:

user (int)

Output:

interests (list [])

search_reminders_by_time(time)¶
Searches mongodb for a list of reminders

scheduled for a specific time

Parameters

time (Str) – String formatted datetime obj “%m-%d-%Y-%H-%M”

Returns

Array of reminders and the uuid for them

Return type

List

search_reminders_by_uuid(uuid)¶

Searched mongodb for a list reminders scheduled by a specific uuid

Parameters

uuid – Unique identifier for a discord

user

Returns

Array of reminders from that user

Return type

List

store_guild_channel_prefs(guild, ignored_channels)¶

Stores the guild preferences

Parameters

  • guild (int) – The uuid of a guild

  • ignored_channels – The preferences for a guild

store_reminder(uuid, msg, time)¶

Stores reminders for users

Parameters

  • uuid (Int) – Unique identifier for the user

  • user (User) – User object for the user

  • msg (Str) – The message to remind a user of

  • time (Str) – When to remind the user

Returns

That the operation was successful

Return type

Bool

Output:

True

Updates a guilds preferences

  • prefs (dict) – The preferences for a guild

Returns
